title.label: Solid game and Cheap to have fun

content.label: This is a solid Card game, with Fast games, deep strategy, acessible and cheap. And you can play the game easily without investing any money since the game have a lot os bonuses. Th community is great too.

Havent played in years. Came back to find the same bugs as when the game first came out. 20% of the time the computer opponent stops making moves in the middle of a match so you have to surrender. Sometimes clicking a card in your hand lines up and then gets stuck under your hand instead of zooming in. Bugs really need to be fixed before bringing new stuff out. Those are just the 2 i see every day i play.
Some new updates are good. Some card interactions need some additional animations I. E. The ones with none. Overall good game.

title.label: Fun game but a little buggy

content.label: I really enjoy playing this game. I just started but have encountered a bug that makes it difficult to progress. I cannot open up the merchant menu; the screen says connecting to server but stays on that screen.

title.label: Game is Unplayable at the moment for me

content.label: Can‚Äôt load shop every time I try to go to the merchant or buy singles it crashes. It‚Äôs a fun game and I miss playing it. I‚Äôll change my rating once it‚Äôs playable but for the time being I can‚Äôt rate something I can‚Äôt play well.
Don‚Äôt play this. Better card games out there.
1992 graphics can beat this B.S.

If the game wasnt the best card type battler on mobile I wouldnt bother, however even with its major problems this is leagues better than rest of what is available. This isnt major praise though.

The game is frankly best described as a lock down death spiral. Going first is incredibly powerful due to how creatures deal damage to each other. There can be the occasional game of back and forth but comebacks are almost impossible without drawing a very luck combo. 

Lets also top it off with awful, did I say awful hero balance. Very few are viable and a few are even virtually unplayable. No, Im not kidding, you will almost never see a few and you will literally never see about two. These balance problems extend heavily into the cards that make up the battle decks of cards you draw from. 

Again its fine for mobile time wasting but as an actual CCG its laughably bad compared to whats out there and if you spend money on it youre going to regret it. 

Not awful. Not great. But a great time waster? Yup!

This is easily the fairest, and funnest mobile TCG I‚Äôve played. I‚Äôve played MTG off and on for about 23 years, and at one time I came to prefer Shadow Era over MTGo. The cards are well thought out to avoid overpowering strategies, while remaining devastating in their combination. Getting a competitive deck together is blissfully easy for a free player, yet building a truly competitive deck takes skill. 

Wulven however, could really use a better plan, and more support. There have been very few cards added to a relatively small card pool since I started about 4-5 years ago. The post-release changes to digital cards makes buying the physical cards seem like a shaky idea. There didn‚Äôt seem to be much thought about tournaments when designing the UI so (the last I knew) they were setting them up using private battle function, since there were only 3 ways to play, Campaign(AI), Battle (Random opponent), or private battle (password to enter). This seemed like a very sloppy way to organize a tournament, and it would be much nicer to see it integrated into the UI, so players can enter and play tournaments through the menu. All that aside I still give it five stars, because it is a game that focuses on fairness and fun over being an overly flashy cash-grab, and that‚Äôs rare but it shows integrity. I‚Äôve made several crystal purchases just to support Wulven for a job well done.

Surprisingly good. Gameplay is great, building is good. I would like to see some updates to have it look better like the shadow era that come up looks generic. I also love the variety of characters and game styles you can have. Very underestimated game. Good job please keep up with the updates will be looking forward to it.

This game is pay to win just like most other games you will find in any other App Store. It‚Äôs about the advertisements for them. Sponsors and such. The game play isn‚Äôt novel enough to make it worth it. Nice try.

title.label: Hoping blockchain brings in more players

content.label: The game is great, just needs more players and more support

I used to enjoy this game and recently came back to check our update. It‚Äôs far better than it used to be and I‚Äôm enjoying trying to level up. Stable app with great card designs and nice card gameplay mechanics.

Ever since the games development decisions have been taken over and dominated by ‚ÄúGONDORIAN‚Äù the arrogant git - the game has become a total waste of time - nothing but broken promises lies and horrible choices by this developer. Was a great game before his taking the reins now it is just an ultra slowly underdeveloped mess with no real future. Terrible solo play now with a fisher price playing ‚ÄúChampaign‚Äù mode that is the biggest joke on the planet. Avoid at all costs and save yourself from a painfully frustrating ride to nowhere.
Fun game! Waste hours playing it!
Love this game! Incorporation of strategy and tactics into an action packed card game. So many cards to choose from, so many styles of play. Great game!

This is probably one of the few tcg games that have good card graphics and doesn't feel like it was made for a ten year old. The game has a deep combat system with a wide variety of cards that are easily attainable as a free to play player. I highly recommend..

The only thing I don‚Äôt like is that in campaign mode, the ai has no hero. so when I end up with a board full of creatures, I can‚Äôt kill him. I have to wait till he summons a creature to do any dmg and since he usually only summons 1 creature a turn, I can only attack with one creature. it takes forever to win a game I could of won like 5 turns ago
Its a fun game.

I have been trying the game, working through the storyline. A lot of fights seem to be designed so you win by taking advantage of the ai being an idiot in situations they have overwhelming force available rather than playing in ways that are good vs humans
I‚Äôve been playing Shadow Era for years. I‚Äôve tried different ones. But none come as close to this. New expansions and heroes and allies are needed though. Asap!!!! lol
Having fun playing with my brother. Seems fair and not too ‚Äúpay to win‚Äù right now. But offers cool stuff to buy.
Good game pretty addictive
Download this CCG is gangster af

title.label: I love it it is the beat

content.label: I love it it is the beat

Addictive game. Keep coming back after weeks away, just can‚Äôt leave it alone. 
One of my favorite games, always stable and steady releases. 
Easy to play game that I‚Äôll never have an iOS device without it. Now to just get some more campaign foils. üòÖ
Addicting game play!
Played when the game was new and left for awhile. Recently reinstalled and started playing again. I love the new updates and new cards.
Thanks for making this game and all the great updates u guys have done to improve this game!!!!
I started playing this game at launch stop playing for bout 2yrs glad I came back.
Been playing for years! It‚Äôs my go to card game! Very fun to think through the various strategies and decks!
Bigger campaign, more complex story lines for all hero‚Äôs I think I will be very busy playing all and beating all difficulties
It‚Äôs a great game
Very nice to see a quality game where you don‚Äôt need to pay 2 win.
It's a fun game for mindless playing or climbing ranks. It's neat
Great art too. My fave in TCG s
Doesn‚Äôt take long picking up on the mechanics of the game. A must try, and very addictive!
Amazing gameplay and good storyline.
This is a game that would not disappoint card game fans. The UI is good and there are in-depth strategies. The animation is a little slow, I hope there is an option to turn it off.
Does anyone even play this anymore?

title.label: Stop looking for a better balanced TCG to try

content.label: Great to play something not begging for money that has regular updates and bring new features. There is a solo game play that can be challenging and will make you use your brain to build a deck to beat it (three star solo missions). PVP is very balanced with lots of players. Also a meltdown version that lets you play cross class cards you don‚Äôt own which is a way to discover new stuff. All cards are available in the store so while it will take you a bit of time to build up you might find yourself playing in years and I believe there is a dual pvp version in development. Genuinely a great game. Only negative is that if you want more from the community and guilds you have to use Messenger app to log into the approved chat rooms as the game a single world chat room. GLHF
Its a fun and enjoyable game to pick up and play anytime. It may take a few games to fully understand it.

I played this game a long time ago and it was much better before all this new crap. I like the campaign addition, but it is impossible to beat the 3 star challenges on the second or 3rd location on the map. It doesn‚Äôt make sense that the opponent would start out with monsters on the field. There is almost no way to get over that disadvantage. Also these in app purchases are stupid. I understand why it was done, but it makes it impossible or way to time consuming to build up coins and crystals to build the deck you want. This game was way better before these changes.

This game is great I've been playing since it first came out. It is kind of like a combination of magic the gathering and herthstone. It has many cool features and it is a free to play which makes it even better.
Similar to MTG, but not overpowered, resources/mana better balanced, but they are super slow at introducing new sets. Like four years to create one and a half sets.

Power hungry admins ban anyone they please... While those same admins do whatever they want with no consequences.

I saw a admin(Phantom aka Joseph Cook board member) look up private account info about a player... use it in chat (versus someone he didn‚Äôt like).  Then the admin banned everyone who called him out for foul play.

Great way to loose any money spent on cards via permanent bans handed out anytime admins please
The best game super cool

I enjoy this game since it eats up my time. It brings a challenge to using the card decks effectively. At first, it was tough but now it gets tougher. I'm not use to playing these types of games. Overall, it's fun, challenging, and beautiful artwork.
This game is great recent changes have made it better I been onboard since the first kick starter . Give it a try I played magic for over 10 years
Not much update.
